name: part_003
file: tmp_【#天音かなた3DLIVE】僕が主役でもいいですか？【ホロライブ】 [8lkam88qeZw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: End of the performance of 'Byoushin wo Kamu'.
Transition scene with instrumental music and a temporary blackout.
Performance of the song 'KING' by Kanaria.
MC section where Amane Kanata talks with her guests Tokoyami Towa and Kiryu Coco.

subtitles.original: Lai-Lai...
subtitles.english: Lai-Lai...

subtitles.original:
KING
作詞・作曲：Kanaria
subtitles.english:
KING
Lyrics & Music: Kanaria

subtitles.original: ハイ！ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hi! Hi!

subtitles.original: 幽閉利口逝く前に
subtitles.english: Before confined cleverness passes away

subtitles.original: 幽閉利口に難儀だい
subtitles.english: It's a struggle for confined cleverness

subtitles.original: 幽閉ストップ 知ってないし
subtitles.english: I don't know anything about a confined stop

subtitles.original: 勘弁にしといてなんて惨憺
subtitles.english: Saying 'give me a break' is so wretched

subtitles.original: ひたひたと降る欠片のアイロニー
subtitles.english: The irony of fragments falling steadily

subtitles.original: 誰もが願う無機質なような
subtitles.english: Like the inorganic state everyone wishes for

subtitles.original: 一足先に始めて太陽な
subtitles.english: Starting a step ahead, like the sun

subtitles.original: 先が見えないバンジーハッピーショー
subtitles.english: A bungee happy show where you can't see ahead

subtitles.original: 無いのあなたにお願い一つ
subtitles.english: I have one request for you who has nothing

subtitles.original: 相も変わらずおまけにワーニワーニ
subtitles.english: As usual, and furthermore, worry worry

subtitles.original: 無いのあなたにお願い一つ
subtitles.english: I have one request for you who has nothing

subtitles.english: Left Side, Right Side

subtitles.english: Baring your teeth, pa pa pa

subtitles.english: How embarrassing

subtitles.english: You are KING

subtitles.original: 無邪気に遊ぶ 期待期待のダーリンダーリン
subtitles.english: Playing innocently, my expected darling darling

subtitles.original: 健気に笑う 痛い痛いの消える
subtitles.english: Smiling bravely, the pain, pain, goes away

subtitles.original: 無様に死ねる 苦い思いも無くなって
subtitles.english: I can die unsightly, with all bitter thoughts gone

subtitles.original: ラララブラットタッタ
subtitles.english: La la Love Rat-ta-ta

subtitles.original: 嫌い嫌いの最低泣いてら
subtitles.english: Hate, hate, I'm crying at my worst

subtitles.english: Baring your teeth, pa pa pa

subtitles.original: 邪魔くさいね
subtitles.english: How bothersome

subtitles.original: You are KING
subtitles.english: You are KING

subtitles.original: You are KING
subtitles.english: You are KING

subtitles.original: みんな、ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: ということで、ゲストに来てくれました
subtitles.english: So, joining me as guests...

subtitles.original: 同期の常闇トワと、桐生ココです！
subtitles.english: ...are my fellow 4th gen members, Tokoyami Towa and Kiryu Coco!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 初めてね、3人で踊りましたけど
subtitles.english: It was our first time performing as a trio...

subtitles.original: めっちゃ楽しかった！
subtitles.english: ...and it was so much fun!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: The best!

subtitles.original: わちゃわちゃ感が4期生っぽかったな
subtitles.english: That chaotic energy was so typical of the 4th gen.

subtitles.original: みんなびっくりしたんじゃないかな、この二人が来てくれるって
subtitles.english: I bet everyone was surprised to see these two show up.

subtitles.original: やめなさい、うるさい、うるさい
subtitles.english: Stop it! You're being too loud!

subtitles.original: 4期生はね、やっぱり4期生はね
subtitles.english: As for the 4th generation... as expected...

subtitles.original: よいしょ、全員ね
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone...

subtitles.original: トワもね、ルーナも明日、明後日かな
subtitles.english: Towa, and Luna tomorrow or the day after...

subtitles.original: 1周年を迎えますので
subtitles.english: ...will be celebrating our 1st anniversary.

subtitles.original: そうですよ
subtitles.english: That's right!

subtitles.original: これからも4期生頑張っていきたいと思いますので
subtitles.english: We'll keep doing our best as the 4th generation...

subtitles.original: 皆さん、応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: ...so please keep supporting us!

subtitles.original: ありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: よし、今度はみんなで歌おうな
subtitles.english: Alright, let's all sing together next time.

subtitles.original: 歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's do it!

subtitles.original: 今度は4期みんなで
subtitles.english: Next time, with all of the 4th gen.

subtitles.original: とりあえず2021年初めて
subtitles.english: Anyway, for the first time in 2021...

subtitles.original: 最初に歌った歌、これだったんだよ、ほら、4期生の
subtitles.english: ...this was the first song we sang. It's the 4th gen's...

subtitles.original: 歌い始め
subtitles.english: ...first song of the year!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: あけましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: やったよ、本当におめでたいね
subtitles.english: We did it! It's really worth celebrating.

subtitles.original: 1年早かった
subtitles.english: The year went by so fast.

subtitles.original: また今年も頑張りたいと思います、な
subtitles.english: I want to work hard again this year, right?

subtitles.original: もう、4期生、みんなで楽しく頑張ります！
subtitles.english: Yeah, the 4th gen will all work hard and have fun together!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろう、ありがとう
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Thank you.

subtitles.original: トワとココとはちょっと名残惜しいけど、ありがとう
subtitles.english: It's a shame to say goodbye to Towa and Coco already, but thank you.

subtitles.original: かなたのステージだからね
subtitles.english: It's your stage, after all.

subtitles.original: あなたの主役、主役
subtitles.english: You're the star! The star!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、バイバイ
subtitles.english: Thank you! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: ポーズ取っておこうよ、バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Let's strike a pose before we go. Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: はい、ということでゲストでトワとココが来てくれました
subtitles.english: Alright, so Towa and Coco joined us as guests.

subtitles.original: いや本当、本当に嬉しい
subtitles.english: I'm really, really happy.

subtitles.original: この間のね、あの延期になっちゃった日も
subtitles.english: Even on the day it was postponed...

subtitles.original: 二人はね、来てくれて、一緒に練習をね、してくれました
subtitles.english: ...the two of them came and practiced with me.

subtitles.original: 本当に本当に、同期のみんな
subtitles.english: Truly, all my gen-mates...

subtitles.original: 今日はね、あの、一緒には歌えなかったけど
subtitles.english: I couldn't sing with them today, but...

subtitles.original: わためとルーナも
subtitles.english: ...Watame and Luna too...

subtitles.original: かけがえのない、一生、大切...
subtitles.english: ...are irreplaceable, lifelong treasures...
